snippet: From our colleagues on the Economix blog: Mitt Romney has noted that women's jobs account for 92.3 percent of the net job loss since President Obama took office. But as a picture of the recession and its aftermath, that number is misleading.
abstract: From our colleagues on the Economix blog: Mitt Romney has noted that women's jobs account for 92.3 percent of the net job loss since President Obama took office. But as a picture of the recession and its aftermath, that number is misleading.

headline.main: Job Growth Isn't Just a Women's Issue
